lines: First, I prepare. Then I have faith. #<Author:0x000055c501360af8>
author: <Author:0x000055c501360af8>

lines: We cannot always build the future for our youth, but we can build our youth for the future.  #<Author:0x000055c5013d32b0>
author: <Author:0x000055c5013d32b0>

lines: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap, but by the seeds that you plant. #<Author:0x000055c5013ba300>
author: <Author:0x000055c5013ba300>

lines: It’s better to look ahead and prepare, than to look back and regret. #<Author:0x000055c50142a650>
author: <Author:0x000055c50142a650>

lines: Be prepared, work hard, and hope for a little luck. Recognize that the harder you work and the better prepared you are, the more luck you might have. #<Author:0x000055c50140bae8>
author: <Author:0x000055c50140bae8>

lines: Never, never, never give up. #<Author:0x000055c5013f0388>
author: <Author:0x000055c5013f0388>

lines: If you have made mistakes, even serious ones, there is always another chance for you.  What we call failure is not the falling down, but the staying down. #<Author:0x000055c50145a648>
author: <Author:0x000055c50145a648>

lines: Obstacles don’t have to stop you. If you run into a wall, don’t turn around and give up. Figure out how to climb it, go through it or work around it. #<Author:0x000055c501440950>
author: <Author:0x000055c501440950>

lines: There is no chance, no destiny, no fate, that can hinder or control the firm resolve of a determined soul. #<Author:0x000055c5014b8ec8>
author: <Author:0x000055c5014b8ec8>

lines: A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination and hard work. #<Author:0x000055c50148b2c0>
author: <Author:0x000055c50148b2c0>

lines: Have patience with all things, but, first of all with yourself. #<Author:0x000055c5015038b0>
author: <Author:0x000055c5015038b0>

lines: Patience is not simply the ability to wait—it's how we behave while we're waiting.  #<Author:0x000055c5014ea810>
author: <Author:0x000055c5014ea810>

lines: Patience is a form of wisdom. It demonstrates that we understand and accept the fact that sometimes things must unfold in their own time. #<Author:0x000055c5015ba588>
author: <Author:0x000055c5015ba588>

lines: Patience and tenacity of purpose are worth more than twice their weight of cleverness. #<Author:0x000055c501584fa0>
author: <Author:0x000055c501584fa0>

lines: Patience is more than simply learning to wait. It is having learned what is worth your time. #<Author:0x000055c501631070>
author: <Author:0x000055c501631070>

lines: Anything is possible when you have the right people there to support you. #<Author:0x000055c501613570>
author: <Author:0x000055c501613570>

lines: Many people will walk in and out of your life but only true friends will leave footprints in your heart. #<Author:0x000055c5015d95a0>
author: <Author:0x000055c5015d95a0>

lines: I would rather walk with a friend in the dark, than alone in the light. #<Author:0x000055c501661dd8>
author: <Author:0x000055c501661dd8>

lines: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud. #<Author:0x000055c5016414c0>
author: <Author:0x000055c5016414c0>

lines: Good friends are like stars. You don't always see them, but you know they're always there. #<Author:0x000055c50169bd80>
author: <Author:0x000055c50169bd80>

lines: The whole purpose of education is to turn mirrors into windows. #<Author:0x000055c501682420>
author: <Author:0x000055c501682420>

lines: Intelligence plus character-that is the goal of true education. #<Author:0x000055c5016f3d00>
author: <Author:0x000055c5016f3d00>

lines: Children must be taught how to think, not what to think. #<Author:0x000055c5016d2498>
author: <Author:0x000055c5016d2498>

lines: One child, one teacher, one book, one pen can change the world. #<Author:0x000055c50174a8d0>
author: <Author:0x000055c50174a8d0>

lines: Education is for improving the lives of others and for leaving your community and world better than you found it. #<Author:0x000055c50172aa08>
author: <Author:0x000055c50172aa08>

lines: A life lived with integrity… is a shining star in whose light others may follow in the years to come. #<Author:0x000055c5017b0b30>
author: <Author:0x000055c5017b0b30>

lines: When you say 'yes' to others, make sure you aren't saying 'no' to yourself. #<Author:0x000055c501771a20>
author: <Author:0x000055c501771a20>

lines: Real integrity is doing the right thing, knowing that nobody’s going to know whether you did it or not. #<Author:0x000055c50180b4e0>
author: <Author:0x000055c50180b4e0>

lines: The time is always right to do what is right. #<Author:0x000055c5017e88f0>
author: <Author:0x000055c5017e88f0>

lines: Integrity is choosing courage over comfort; choosing what is right over what is fun, fast, or easy; and choosing to practice our values rather than simply professing them. #<Author:0x000055c5017c1f20>
author: <Author:0x000055c5017c1f20>

lines: Once you choose hope, anything's possible. #<Author:0x000055c501880d80>
author: <Author:0x000055c501880d80>

lines: Just as one cannot live without dreams, one cannot live without hope. If dreams reflect the past, hope summons the future. #<Author:0x000055c50183b5a0>
author: <Author:0x000055c50183b5a0>

lines: Infuse your life with action. Don't wait for it to happen. Make it happen. Make your own future. Make your own hope. #<Author:0x000055c5018f01a8>
author: <Author:0x000055c5018f01a8>
